name: Escape From Kaos Cove
description:
A dark fantasy text adventure with multiple endings. 

Escpape from Kaos Cove puts you in the shoes of a fisherman named Orin, the sort of character that might give the heroes' party a short side quest in a fantasy RPG.

But this time, there are no heroes coming to save the day. It's up to you to figure out what to do when your daughter becomes tainted with Kaos magic...
